name: Emakina
description:
In a context of change, Emakina designs and executes useful, effective, original and memorable user experiences that meet the expectations of individuals. It is these experiences that differentiate a company from its competitors and determine customer loyalty as well as the value of the company.

Our services include communication, web & mobile applications and e-commerce development. Emakina is the leading independent group of full-service digital agencies in Europe. We connect our clients to their own future.
